text: Allahara bahirae sihamte yiboraka ahbana karae se'iboraka tomaloke gali-sapani naparaiba. Kiyano sihamte simalanghana karai ajnanatabasatah allahako gali diba parae, e'idarae ami pratyeka jatira drstita sihamtara karyakalapa sobhaniya karai dicho; tara pichata sihamtara pratipalakara ocarate'i sihamtara pratyarartana. Iyara pichata te'om sihamtaka sihamtara karyakalapa samparke jana'i diba
